name: christmas pickle ornament
notes:
add a bit of whimsy to your holiday decor with this adorable christmas pickle ornament! crocheted with worsted-weight yarn, this pickle measures about 3 inches and is topped with a cute little santa hat. this quick and easy project uses mainly single crochet stitches with bobble stitches to create the iconic bumpy texture of a pickle, making it beginner-friendly yet full of charm. perfect for hanging on the tree, gifting, or adding to festive garlands, this christmas pickle ornament is sure to bring smiles and a touch of fun to your holiday season!

purchase the ad-free pdf on ravelry or find the [free version][1] of the pattern on my website!


  [1]: https://www.onceuponacheerio.com/2024/11/crochet-christmas-pickle-ornament.html
